hold_opened_door.description: Hold the opened door in place to prevent any movement.

wipe_opened_door_surface.description: Carefully wipe the surface of the opened door to remove any dust.

shut_door.description: Close the safe's opened door by moving it towards the safe_body.

dust_off_opened_door.description: Dust off the open door of the safe to ensure cleanliness.

opening_opened_door.description: The door of the safe is already in open position.

secure_opened_door.description: Make sure the opened door is securely held in place.

clean_opened_door_surface.description: Clean the surface of the opened door.

close_door.description: Close the safe's door by swinging it

clean_opened_door.description: Clean the open door of the safe

confirm_closed_door_status.description: Make sure the door of the safe is securely closed.

clean_closed_door_surface.description: Neatly clean the closed door surface to remove any dust or particles.

unlock_door.description: Unlock and open the door of the safe by swinging it away from the safe_body.

dust_off_closed_door.description: Dust off the closed door of the safe to maintain cleanliness.

closing_closed_door.description: The door is securely closed already.

check_closed_door.description: Ensure the door of the safe is in closed status.

wipe_closed_door.description: Wipe the closed door to remove dust.

open_door.description: Open the safe's door by swinging it

clean_closed_door.description: Clean the closed door of the safe

twist_knob_twice.description: Twist the knob of the safe twice for added security.

clean_knob_surface.description: Gently wipe down the knob to keep it clean.

turn_knob.description: Turn the knob of the safe.

freshen_up_knob.description: Freshen up the knob of the safe by wiping it down.

rotate_knob_clockwise.description: Rotate the knob of the safe in a clockwise direction.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob of the safe

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob of the safe

polish_safe_body.description: Polish the exterior of the safe body to make it shine.

dust_off_safe_body.description: Dust off the body of the safe with a clean cloth.

wipe_safe_body.description: Wipe the exterior body of the safe clean.

clean_safe_body.description: Clean the body of the safe

polish_entire_safe.description: Polish the entire safe, including the body, doors, and knob to make it shine.

freshen_up_whole_safe.description: Freshen up the entire safe including the body surface, doors, and knob by wiping them down.

wipe_entire_safe.description: Wipe and clean the entire safe, including body, doors, and knob.

clean_whole_safe.description: Clean the entire safe including the body, doors, and knob
